00008 #include "arena.hpp"

00010 Arena::Arena() {
00011     typedef MyTank *(__cdecl *const InstProc)();
00012 
00013     // Search for and load tank DLLs
00014     WIN32_FIND_DATA found;
00015     HANDLE hsearch = FindFirstFile("tank_*.dll", &found);
00016     if (hsearch != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) do {
00017         HMODULE dll = LoadLibrary(found.cFileName);
00018         InstProc GetNewUserTank = (InstProc)GetProcAddress(dll, "GetNewUserTank");
00019         MyTank *const newtank = GetNewUserTank();
00020         newtank->dll = dll;
00021         tanks.push_back(newtank);
00022     } while (FindNextFile(hsearch, &found));
00023     const BOOL success = FindClose(hsearch);
00024 }
00025 
00026 Arena::~Arena() {
00027     // Delete all tanks and unload their DLLs
00028     for (TankList::iterator i = tanks.begin(); i != tanks.end(); i = tanks.erase(i)) {
00029         const HMODULE dll = (*i)->dll;
00030         delete *i;
00031         const BOOL success = FreeLibrary(dll);
00032     }
00033 }
00034 
00035 void Arena::DoTurn() {
00036     // Make all tanks think
00037     for (TankList::iterator i = tanks.begin(); i != tanks.end(); i++)
00038         (*i)->Think();
00039 }

00041 void Arena::Tick(double t) {
00042     // Displace all mobile objects
00043     for (MobileObjectList::iterator i = mobiles.begin(); i != mobiles.end(); i++)
00044         (*i)->Displace(t);
00045 
00046     // Check for collisions between tanks and bullets
00047     for (TankList::iterator tank = tanks.begin(); tank != tanks.end();) {
00048         for (BulletList::iterator bullet = bullets.begin();;) {
00049             if (bullet == bullets.end()) {
00050                 tank++;
00051                 break;
00052             }
00053             if (bullet->GetDistanceTo(**tank) < bullet->GetRadius() + (*tank)->GetRadius()) {
00054                 (*tank)->Hit(*bullet);
00055                 bullet = bullets.erase(bullet);
00056                 if ((*tank)->IsDead()) {
00057                     delete *tank;
00058                     objects.remove(*tank);
00059                     mobiles.remove(*tank);
00060                     tank = tanks.erase(tank);
00061                     break;
00062                 }
00063             }
00064             else bullet++;
00065         }
00066     }
00067 
00068     // Check for collisions between tanks
00069     for (TankList::iterator tank1 = tanks.begin();; tank1++) {
00070         TankList::iterator tank2 = tank1;
00071         if (++tank2 == tanks.end()) break;
00072         for (; tank2 != tanks.end(); tank2++) {
00073             if (tank1 == tank2) continue;
00074             if ((*tank1)->GetDistanceTo(**tank2) < (*tank1)->GetRadius() + (*tank2)->GetRadius()) {
00075                 (*tank1)->Stop();
00076                 (*tank2)->Stop();
00077             }
00078         }
00079     }
00080 }
